title: Assessment of Helicobacter pylori cytotoxin-associated Gene A (Cag A) protein and its association with ferritin and vitamin B12 deficiencies among adult healthy asymptomatic residents in Sharjah, United Arab Emirates
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Om Kolthoom M. Weisy, Reena A. Kedia, Ibrahim Mahmoud, Raed O. Abu Odeh, Bashair M. Mussa, Salah Abusnana, Sameh S.M. Soliman, Jibran Sualeh Muhammad, Mohamad Hamad, Rose Ghemrawi, Ghalia Khoder
